mapper.insert: insert into issue_coupon values (issue_coupon_seq.nextval, #{memberNo}, #{couponNo}, sysdate, sysdate+14, 1)
mapper.select: select issue_no as issueNo, member_no as memberNo, coupon_no as couponNo, issue_date as issueDate, to_char(end_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as endDate, coupon_status as couponStatus from issue_coupon
mapper.update: update issue_coupon set coupon_status = 2 where issue_no = #{issueNo}
mapper.select: select*from( SELECT rnum, issue_no AS issueNo, member_no AS memberNo, coupon_no AS couponNo, TO_CHAR(issue_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS issueDate, TO_CHAR(end_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS endDate, coupon_status AS couponStatus FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY issue_date DESC) as rnum, issue_no, member_no, coupon_no, issue_date, end_date, coupon_status FROM issue_coupon WHERE member_no = #{memberNo} ) t ) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}
